 Bears  Can't  Drift!?is  an  action  packed  Kart  Racer  set  in  a
 beautifully stylised world. Out now on Early access, race  across  a
 variety of tracks  and game  modes with  up to  four  player  split-
 screen. Time to find out if Bears really can Drift!Game  modes  Time
 Trial Put your skills to the test in  a drive  only,  infinite  time
 trial. Use the action button to quick restart if things go wrong and
 try to beat the top times and friends with four player splitscreen.

 For more info go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/338040/
